text: Prochitay im povest' o Noye. Vot, on skazal svoyemu narodu: "Narod moy! Yesli dlya vas tyagostny moye prebyvaniye mezhdu vami i moya peredacha znameniy Bozhiikh, to ya na Boga vozlagayu moye upovaniye. Postav'te vashe delo v nadlezhashchem yego vide: a takzhe i obogotvoryayemykh vami, i pust' vashe delo ne budet kakoy-to temnotoy dlya vas; potom sudite o mne i ne zastavlyayte menya zhdat'
